original_title: Licántropo: El asesino de la luna llena
overview: 1996 Spanish horror film that is the eleventh in a long series about the werewolf Count Waldemar Daninsky, played by Paul Naschy. Following his near-fatal heart attack in 1991, Naschy made this film as an intended comeback, but it was poorly distributed and received bad reviews.
title: Lycantropus: The Moonlight Murders
